dmca.title: Cease, Desist and Smell the Daisies [Blogger]
dmca.body:
Notice to Cease and Desist 
The following Blog: http://monisun.blogspot.com/search/label/Scrapbook is illegally redistributing copyright works via digital means belonging to artists contracted with our company, D.A.I.5.I.E. Company. (Specifically [Private] and [Private]).
 
We have clearly stated terms on our site that do not permit digital redistribution in any form (You may read them here: http://www.daisiecompany.com/cart/index.php?main_page=conditions .)

This includes use of our product shots.  Each download is considered by law to be a single violation of copyright protected works. Cease and desist immediately or legal action will be taken. 

You have one business day commencing from the time of receipt of this fax to comply before our attorney will contact you. 

Please see the violations listed below, as well as the screen shots of the blog In violation. 

Friday, May 11, 2007 Sandy
